_header: Shroud and feed and drench and harbour the poor
_description: The seven works of bodily mercy — four lines in couplets

CamEmm27.Transcription:
Schrude and fede and drenche and hereborwi þe pouerePrisones and
                    sikemen gladien and frofrePouere liches burie after mannes
                    miȝteÞis boþ þe saue workes þat creiueþ vre
                    driȝte
CamEmm27.Editions:
Person,  Henry Axel. 
             Cambridge Middle English Lyrics.
         Seattle: University of Washington Press, 1953; rev. ed. 1962: 29.
